title: Nicola Sturgeon – 2021 Comments on COP26
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nicola Sturgeon, the Scottish First Minister, on 28 October 2021.
content:
From 31 October to 12 November, Glasgow will host COP26, and welcome leaders, scientists and activists to my home city.
